altTitles.ja: Tsue to Tsurugi no Wistoria
杖と剣のウィストリア

description.en: The new, magical dungeon-adventure fantasy series from the author of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Seeking to fulfill a promise to a childhood friend, Will Serfort enters Regarden Magical Academy with the goal of making it to the top of the magical world. There’s just one problem: he can’t use magic! Will his sword skills be the key to unlocking his true potential?
description.pt-br: A nova série de fantasia mágica e de aventura em masmorras do autor de "É Errado Tentar Pegar Garotas em um Calabouço?" segue a jornada de Will Serfort. Buscando cumprir uma promessa feita a uma amiga de infância, Will ingressa na Academia Mágica de Regarden com o objetivo de alcançar o topo do mundo mágico. Mas há um problema: ele não pode usar magia! Serão suas habilidades com a espada a chave para desbloquear seu verdadeiro potencial?

altTitles.en: Space Heavenly Demon 3077
Cosmic Demon 3077

description.en: After countless years, the Heavenly Demon, sealed within Mount Tai, finally awakened, only to discover that humanity had long abandoned the radiation-soaked Earth and was now exploring the far reaches of the galaxy.

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: Kyuuseishu «Messiah» ~Isekai o Sukutta Motoyuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai o Musou Suru~

altTitles.ja: 救世主《メシア》～異世界を救った元勇者が魔物のあふれる現実世界を無双する～

altTitles.en: The Savior «Messiah» ~The Former Hero Who Saved Another World Beats the Real World Full of Monsters~

altTitles.zh-hk: 救世主《彌賽亞》～現實世界無雙～

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyuuseishu «Messiah» ~Isekai wo Sukutta Motoyuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai wo Musou Suru~

description.en: The "former" savior, Takeru Yamato, was summoned to another world and executed because of his strength. When he wakes up, he finds himself in Japan, where he spent time before being summoned. However, in the city, demons appearing from "gates" rampage, and those called hunters fight using magic. Returning from another world, Takeru decides to hide his powers and live, but…
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、その強さ故に処刑された「元」救世主・大和猛。 目を覚ますとそこは、召喚される前に過ごしていた日本だった。 しかし、街では”ゲート”から現れる魔物が暴れ、ハンターと呼ばれる者たちが魔術を用いて戦っていた。 異世界帰りの猛は、力を隠して暮らす事を決めるが――…。

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムＮＴ

description.en:
U.C. 0097, one year after the opening of "Laplace's Box".  
  
Despite the revelation of the Universal Century Charter that acknowledges the existence and rights of Newtypes, the framework of the world has not been greatly altered.  
  
The conflict later dubbed the "Laplace Incident" is thought to have ended with the downfall of the Neo Zeon remnants known as the Sleeves. In its final battle, two full psycho-frame mobile suits displayed power beyond human understanding. The white unicorn and the black lion were sealed away to remove this danger from people's consciousness, and they should now be completely forgotten.  
  
However, the RX-0 Unicorn Gundam 03, which disappeared two years earlier, is now about to show itself in the Earth Sphere once more. A golden phoenix… named Phenex.  
  
**Notes**:  
Adapted from [不死鳥狩り / Phoenix Hunting](https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B01CZALCMC), the 11 Volume of Gundam Unicorn light novel series.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Novels (on Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B07YZTJ135)  
- [Anime Movie on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20852)

altTitles.ja: ガチアクタ

altTitles.en: Real Trash

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب

آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

altTitles.ja: ニューゲーム!

description.en: Having been inspired by the character designs of a particular video game when she was younger, Suzukaze Aoba, a high school graduate, begins working as a character designer for the game's developer, Eagle Jump. As she works on modelling and designing characters for games in development, she becomes acquainted with her fellow co-workers in the character design department, as well as those from across the company.

title.en: Doukyonin no Sano-kun wa Tada no Yuunou na Tantou Henshuu desu

altTitles.ja: 同居人の佐野くんはただの有能な担当編集です

altTitles.en: My Housemate Sano-kun Is Just My Editor!
My Capable Editor and Housemate, Sano-kun.

description.en:
Shinomiya Teiichiro is a prolific, workaholic novelist who is too consumed with writing to take care of himself. To prevent him from neglecting his well-being, his editor, Sano Satoru, moves in with him. But when the calm and collected Shinomiya finds himself flustered by Sano's constant presence and good looks, he begins to question their relationship. After all, Sano is just his editor, isn't he?!
(Source: MangaUP!)

altTitles.en: Because the Sky is Gray

altTitles.ja: 空が灰色だから

description.en:
A collection of short stories about the everyday lives of girls who have trouble with the people around them.

---

The first volume contains stories about...
- A lonely woman who works part-time, and who has crippling social anxiety that leads to misunderstandings.
- A girl who is 'dumped' by her close friend.
- A single mother who struggles to understand how to make her daughter happy.
- A girl who desperately wants to buy a dress that she thinks could change her life.
... and many more!

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title.en: The Dang Clan’s Swordmaster Heir Just Wants a Normal Life

altTitles.en: Becoming the Swordmaster Rank Young Lord of the Sichuan Tang Family
He Became the Head of the Four Heavenly Dang Family
Becoming the Sacheon Dang's Swordsmaster-Rank Young Lord
Became a swordsman-level Sogami of the Sacheondang family

description.en: The Dang clan of Sacheon, once renowned for its poison and hidden weapons, is now on the path to its demise. That is, until Yeonmyeung Dang, an outcast boy of the clan, awakens by recollecting the memories of his past life as the 'god of swords' who devoted his life to mastering the sword. Will the boy be able to protect his family and fulfill his dream of living a normal life?
description.ko:
독과 암기의 명가였지만 지금은 몰락해버린 사천당가.
그곳에서 태어난 당연명은 문득 검에 미쳐 살며
검신의 경지에 이르렀던 전생을 각성한다.

'이번 생은 평범하게 살고 싶다.'

평범하게 살려면, 역시 검술 실력은 숨겨야겠지.
그런데 방해하는 것들이 너무 많다.

altTitles.en: Hero Has Returned
The Warrior Is Back
Warrior Returns

altTitles.ja: 勇者が帰ってきた

altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

被黑化勇士们毁灭的世界，
绝望之中最后的勇士归来！
经历千辛万苦最终回到地球的勇士金闵洙，可等他的却是人们冰冷的眼光和父母双亡的事实，绝望的他决定毁灭整个世界。男主朴正秀的家人也被陷入到了这场灾难之中…就在这时，朴正秀也被传送到了异世！勇士朴正秀能否拯救这个世界呢？

title.en: Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

altTitles.ja: 舞妓さんちのまかないさん

altTitles.en: The Caterer at the Maiko Manor
The Makanai: Cooking for the Maiko House

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

altTitles.en: I Have an Apocalyptic Underground City
I Have a Post-Apocalyptic Dungeon

description.en:
A Female President? Then come help me manage the shelter. A Female Special Forces Soldier? Then come and be the captain of the guards.   
At the end of the world, titles like CEOs, beautiful women, secretaries, electricians, programmers and all other professions are all no longer useful. Don't be afraid to come to my underground system shelter- as long as you are talented people and human beings!   
  
5 consecutive updates will be launched after February 16.

altTitles.ja: はぴはぴあ！

description.en: Yuki Iwatsuki is a transfer student, today is her first day at her new school. There seems to be some kind of trauma, her classmates “Koneko,” a high-tension girl, and “Akizora Hako,” a box-head girl, are very interested in Yuki! Will she get along with everyone?

title.en: Bad Boy Who Lies In Love

altTitles.th: ลวงรักร้ายของนายแบดบอย

description.en: Just an ordinary girl who had just started her high school life, but she never thought that something would happen and she ended up getting involved with the most senior naughty guy in school. Plus she was asked to be her boyfriend. And what will his life be like after this?
description.th: แค่เด็กสาวธรรมดาคนนึงที่เพิ่งเริ่มต้นชีวิต ม.ปลาย แต่ไม่คิดเลยว่าจะเกิดเรื่องจนต้องมาพัวพันกับรุ่นพี่หนุ่มแบดสุดฮอตในโรงเรียน แถมยังถูกขอให้คบเป็นแฟนอีก แล้วชีวิตฉันหลังจากนี้จะเป็นยังไงต่อละเนี่ย

altTitles.ja: シメジシミュレーション

description.en:
A surreal yet heartwarming 4-koma series about everyday life.  
  
From the author of Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou/Girls' Last Tour.
description.fr: Une jeune fille s'est enfermée dans son placard pendant ses 2 dernières années de collège et se rend compte qu'elle doit maintenant passer au lycée. Quand elle sort de son placard pour la première fois en deux ans et se regarde dans le miroir, elle s'aperçoit que des champignons « shimeji » ont commencé à pousser sur sa tête.

title.en: A Livid Lady's Guide to Getting Even: How I Crushed My Homeland with My Mighty Grimoires

altTitles.ja: ブチ切れ令嬢は報復を誓いました。

altTitles.en: Buchigire Reijou wa Houfuku wo Chikaimashita. ~Madousho no Chikara de Sokoku wo Tatakitsubushimasu~

description.en:
Lady Elizabeth has her engagement annulled at a party by the crown prince, whose heart has moved on to another young noblewoman. She is then imprisoned in the dungeon over unjust accusations, and learns she has been betrayed by the country to which she has devoted everything…

At the peak of her frustration, Elizabeth finally decides to defect, with a grimoire holding hidden and formidable powers in hand!! She begins her new life and trade with the help of Viscount Lucas from the neighbouring country. With a fierce desire for revenge against her home country in her heart.
description.ja:
他の令嬢に心を移した王太子から、パーティーで婚約破棄を告げられた公爵令嬢・エリザベート。そのまま不当な咎で牢屋に幽閉されてしまい、すべてを捧げてきた国からも裏切られたことを知る……。

ついに我慢も限界に達したエリザベートは、強力な力を秘めた魔導書を手に、亡命を決意!!　隣国の子爵・ルーカスの手を借りて新たな地で新生活＆商売を始める。祖国への凄烈な復讐心を胸に秘めながら――。

altTitles.ja: シークレットレディ

altTitles.en: The Lady's Secret

description.en:
I, Yoon Seol-woo, a young woman with the ability to see ghosts, was reincarnated as Rosantine, the eldest daughter of a noble ducal house in a world were witchcraft is considered dangerous. I managed to fake not being able to see ghosts somehow but then...

"Leave my sister's body this instant!", I cried out to the evil spirit who's possessed my one and only beloved little sister.

Only the death penalty awaits me if my ability were to be discovered. Then, there's only one way...

"You're planning to kill Prince Chartus, right?"

I will save the Empire's second prince, Prince Chartus with this ability!

"I'll bet my life on Your Highness."

---

**Links:**
- [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77771)
- [Official Indonesian Translation (Kakao)](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Secret-Lady/3505)
description.id:
"Seorang gadis yang memiliki kemampuan untuk melihat hantu, Yoon Seolwoo, telah bereinkarnasi menjadi Rozentine. Di dunia dia hidup sekarang, dia juga bisa melihat hantu. Akan tetapi, di dunia tersebut, kemampuan seperti itu dilarang dan apabila ketahuan oleh pihak kekaisaran, maka pemilik kekuatan itu harus dihukum mati bersama keluarganya.
Namun, ada jalan lain untuk menyelamatkan dirinya beserta keluarganya dari hukuman tersebut. Rozentine mengetahui dari para hantu, bahwa ada konspirasi yang akan membunuh pangeran ke-2 dengan racun. Jika Rozentine dapat menyelamatkan nyawa pangeran tersebut, mungkin dia bisa meminta imbalan agar dia beserta keluarganya dilindungi.
Bisakah Rozentine menyelamatkan pangeran dan melindungi keluarganya?"
description.ja: 生まれつき幽霊が見えるせいで周りから白い目で見られてきた雪乃だが、ある日突然交通事故で亡くなってしまう。 そして目を覚ますと、アルゼン公爵家の令嬢ロゼンタインに生まれ変わっていた。 前世とは違い両親の愛情を受けながら幸せに育つロゼンタイン。幽霊が見える力はそのままで…。 彼女が暮らすカルタゼン帝国では、呪術を忌み嫌い呪術師を迫害してきた。 ロゼンタインも幽霊が見えるとなれば処刑される道しか残っていなかった。 あることをきっかけに第2皇子シャルトゥスの暗殺計画を知った彼女は、自分と家族を守るため、命をかけて第2皇子暗殺を阻止しようとするが…。
description.ko:
유령을 보는 아이, 윤설우.
유령을 보는 공녀, 로젠타인으로 환생하다!

이번 생에서는 어떻게든 유령을 모른 척해 왔지만….

"당장 내 동생 몸에서 나가!"

하나뿐인 동생의 빙의를 풀기 위해 외쳤다.
하지만 이 능력을 들킨다면 사형뿐.
그렇다면 방법은 하나.

"샤르투스 황자가 죽을 예정이라지?"
이 힘으로 제국의 제2황자, 샤르투스를 구하는 것!

“저하께 제 목숨을 걸겠습니다.”

altTitles.en: Fabulous Beasts
There Are Beasts

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Sesesese! ～Mezase Hatsu H! Doutei Joshi no Tokimeki Daisakusen～

altTitles.en: Sesesese! ～Aiming For My First Time! A Virgin Girl's Heart-Pounding Grand Strategy～

altTitles.ja: せせせせ！～目指せ初H！童貞女子のときめき大作戦～

description.en: A high-energy sexually-charged comedy! Nagara Ayano, who has transformed from a virgin college student into a female version of his middle school self, blindly rushes in headfirst to try and achieve his first sexual experience, but things aren't going as smoothly as he'd hope...!

altTitles.ja: 転生ゴブリンだけど質問ある？

altTitles.en: So What's Wrong with Getting Reborn as a Goblin?

altTitles.zh: 转世哥布林乐队你有什么问题吗?

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉世哥布林樂隊你有什麽問題嗎?

altTitles.en: I'm a Reincarnated Goblin, Any Questions?

altTitles.es: Soy un Goblin Reencarnado, ¿Alguna Otra Pregunta?

description.en: An ordinary office worker should have died in a traffic accident, but when he awoke he became a goblin. Goblins have a lifespan of only seven days. However, the hero who has been given the skill "Human 80 years" takes advantage of his longevity and takes over the skills of many goblins and even the demon king who is on the verge of destined life, and stands out in a different world. Weakest Race x Strongest Skill = The strongest fantasy is incomparable!
description.es: Un empleado de oficina común debería haber muerto en un accidente de tránsito, pero cuando despertó se convirtió en un Goblin. Sin embargo, el protagonista al que se le ha dado la habilidad "Humano 80 años" aprovecha al máximo su longevidad, se hace cargo de las habilidades de muchos duendes, e incluso del demonio que está al borde de la vida destinada, y se destaca en un mundo diferente. Raza más débil x Habilidad más fuerte = ¡La fantasía de Musou más fuerte!

altTitles.ja: バトルクラブ

description.en:
When freshman transfer Mokichi arrives at Swan Academy High, he's got a chance to start over with a clean slate. He's got a plan, too. Kick the butts of the toughest guys in school, prove himself to be the baddest dude around, and run the whole shebang. Problem is, it's his butt that gets kicked that first day. Completely humiliated, Mokichi joins the Wrestling Club in hopes of learning to fight. There he meets unlikely allies, Tamako and Higuchi, two of the hottest battle babes to ever roll their sweaty bods over Swan Academy's gym mats. And Mokichi's gonna need all the friends he can get, what with the likes of the Karate Club looking to "break in" the new kid in the worst way possible.

---
**Links:**  
- [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/manga.php?id=5952)
description.pt: Quando chega o calouro de transferência Mokichi à Acadêmia Swan, ele tem uma chance de começar sua história do zero. Ele tem um plano. Chutar o traseiro dos caras mais durões na escola, para mostrar ser o pior cara do lugar. O problema é que ele acaba se dando mal no primeiro dia. Completamente humilhado, Mokichi junta-se ao clube de Luta-livre na esperança de aprender a lutar. Lá ele encontra aliados improváveis, Tamako e Higuchi, duas lindas garotas que batalham com seus corpos suados sobre esteiras de ginástica. E Mokichi vai precisar de todos os amigos que ele puder conseguir, já que o pessoal do clube de karatê tem uma preferência em especial de "quebrá-lo" sempre que possível.

altTitles.en: High Class Society
High Society (Gyeonwoo)

description.en:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: Mou Sukoshi dake, Soba ni Ite

altTitles.en: Stay By My Side Just a Little Longer

altTitles.ja: もう少しだけ、そばにいて

description.en: "I want to live my life with you, Haruto." Haruto, a novelist, and Akira, a salaryman, have been a couple since their college days and are now living together. A few years ago, an accident confined Haruto to a wheelchair, but he finds quiet happiness in living each day with the person he loves. However, because Haruto cares more about Akira than anyone else, he keeps a "little secret"...

title.en: Hazure Waku no "Joutai Ijou Skill" de Saikyou ni Natta Ore ga Subete o Juurin Suru made

altTitles.en: Failure Frame: I Became the Strongest and Annihilated Everything With Low-Level Spells

altTitles.ru: Я стал самым сильным с провальным навыком 【 ненормальное состояние】, я разрушу всё

altTitles.ja: ハズレ枠の【状態異常スキル】で最強になった俺がすべてを蹂躙するまで

altTitles.ko: 꽝취급 받는 [상태이상 스킬]로 최강이 된 내가 전부 유린할 때까지

altTitles.zh: 最强的我最终蹂躏一切

altTitles.zh-hk: 靠廢柴技能【狀態異常】成為最強的我將蹂躪一切

description.en:
Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself.

The only problem? Mimori’s skills are abysmal at best, and he’s banished to a deadly dungeon. 

But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful he’s become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?!
description.pt:
Durante a viagem escolar Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank-E - um status extremamente baixo em comparação com seus colegas de classe. Assim, o personagem secundário e herói abandonado, se tornara o mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.


---
description.pt-br: Durante a viagem escolar, Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank E – um status extremamente baixo comparado a seus colegas de classe. Assim, o herói abandonado se tornará absolutamente o demônio mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.

altTitles.en: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
Frieren at the Funeral

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.en: Frieren: Remnants Of The Departed

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.en: The Four Knights of Apocalypse

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

altTitles.en: 4KOA

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

altTitles.en: Investigating with Junk-chan

altTitles.ja: ポンコツちゃん検証中

description.en:
Mito is a boy with a big heart and the frightening face of a thug. He wants people to rely on him, but he scares people off at first sight. That is, until his schoolmate Yumesaki asks him to help her.  
  
Yumesaki has a problem. Every day she is given a new, random supernatural ability by an mysterious being called God, as she has to test them in order to stop a giant meteorite that will destroy the planet in a year.  
  
Sure, the goal is to save the planet, but when a boy and a girl spend time together, there are more tender things to discover too!
description.es:
Mito es un muchacho con un corazón grande y con una cara de matón espeluznante. Quiere ayudar a la gente y que se apoyen en él, pero el asusta a la gente a primera vista. Eso, hasta que su compañera de clase Yumesaki le pide que le ayude.  
  
Yumesaki tiene un problema. Cada día le es otorgada una habilidad supernatural al azar de parte de un ente llamado Dios, pues debe probarlas con la meta de detener un meteorito enorme que destruirá el planeta en un año.  
  
Claro, la meta es salvar al planeta, ¡pero cuando un muchacho y una muchacha pasan tiempo juntos tienden a descubrir cosas mas tiernas también!

altTitles.en: Samurai in Another World

description.en:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
description.ja:
戦国時代最強の剣豪、異世界転移。

戦国時代末期、最強の剣豪・ギンコは常に、自分より強いものとの死闘に飢えていた。切って切って切りまくり、ついにこの世に自分以上の強者がいないと絶望した矢先、異世界へ転移！　目の前には――ドラゴン！？
description.pt-br:
A espadachim mais forte do período dos Reinos Combatentes, transferida para outro mundo.

No final do Período dos Reinos Combatentes, Ginko, a maior espadachim da época, estava sempre ansiosa por lutar até a morte com alguém mais forte que ela. Depois de cortar e cortar e cortar, ela finalmente se desespera porque não há ninguém mais forte do que ela neste mundo, e então ela é transferida para outro mundo! Diante de seus olhos está um dragão!

altTitles.en: The Heavenly Demon Can't Live a Normal Life
The Reincarnation of the Dark Master

altTitles.uk: Небесний демон не може жити нормальним життям

altTitles.pt-br: O Demônio Celestial não pode viver uma Vida Normal

altTitles.es-la: El demonio celestial no puede llevar una vida normal

description.en:
“Is this a mission I was sent on by the gods? Or is this just divine punishment?”

Baek Jung-hyeok, the Heavenly Demon of Murim, finds that he’s been reincarnated into the body of Roman Dimitri, the dim-witted son of a baron who’s obsessed with the luxuries of the aristocratic lifestyle. But with his new status, Jung-hyeok is ready to shake things up on the continent of Salamander.

Will the divine demon accomplish what he’s set out to do? And will he finally get the answers to this mysterious reincarnation?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ko:
천마 백중혁, 드미트리 가문의 장남으로 눈을 뜨다.
드미트리의 얼간이, 차남에게 밀린 장남.
세간의 평판은 중요하지 않다.
천마, 아니, 로만 드미트리는 앞으로 평범하게 살 수 없다.
압도하는 천마 판타지!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ru:
Демон Пэк Чун Хёк.
Некогда сильнейшая личность в Муриме умирает и обнаруживает себя в теле старшего сына дома Дмитрий. В теле человека, которого все называют дураком. Человека, который постоянно находится в тени своего младшего брата и которому глубоко плевать на мнение окружающих.
Но теперь, демон... Нет, Роман Дмитрий больше не сможет жить привычной жизнью.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.uk: "Це місія, на яку мене послали боги? Чи це просто божественна кара?" Пек Чжун Хьок, божественний демон, повелитель Муріма, виявляє, що він реінкарнувався в тіло Романа Дмитровича, недоумкуватого сина барона, одержимого розкішшю аристократичного способу життя. Але з новим статусом Чжун Хьок готовий перевернути все на континенті Саламандр. Чи вдасться божественному демону досягти того, що він задумав? І чи отримає він нарешті відповіді на загадки цього таємничого перевтілення?
description.zh:
最强教主重生成异国废柴！
天不亡我！今生注定不凡！
武林最强天魔神教教主白钟赫生命自然终结后再睁眼发现自己成为了卢曼·德米特里，德米特里公认的傻子，且不如弟弟的德米特里长子。但外人的评价已经不重要。从此卢曼将不再浑浑噩噩，他的生活将会发生天翻地覆的变化，卢曼注定不再平凡！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.pt-br:
“O Demônio Celestial” Baek Joong-Hyuk abre os olhos como o filho mais velho da família Dimitry. Conhecido como o idiota da família, deixado de lado por causa do segundo filho. A opinião do mundo é irrelevante. “Demônio Celestial”, não, Roman Dimitry, não pode viver uma vida normal.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)

altTitles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王
遊戯王

altTitles.en: The King of Games

altTitles.th: เกมกลคนอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
description.pt-br: O estudante Yugi Mutou passou a maior parte de seu tempo sozinho jogando jogos - até que ele resolveu o Enigma do Milênio, um artefato egípcio misterioso! Possuída pelo quebra-cabeça, Yugi se torna o Yu-Gi-Oh(O Rei dos Jogos), e irá enfrentar os desafios dos Jogos das Sombras - Jogos mortais com grandes apostas e altos riscos, como apostar a sua alma e a alma de seus queridos amigos! O mangá contém novas histórias não vistas no anime, incluindo a origem de Yugi e seus amigos!

description.en:
Saintess Beryl, who must identify the demon among the three families possessing inhuman power and influence. Only her divine power can reveal who the demon truly is.

"Who will you marry?"

To escape from the two previous hellish lives, Beryl chooses Duke Vine, who is the real demon. She does this to survive and possibly exact cruel revenge on those who killed her.

Thus, Beryl enters the demon's castle. Having learned only how to restrain her desires at the temple, Beryl now learns from the unholy and tempting demon Vine how to truly desire...!
description.ko:
인간답지 않은 힘과 영향력을 가진 세 가문 중에악마를 가려내야 하는 성녀 베릴.오로지 그녀의 신성만이 악마가 누구인지 가려낼 수 있다.

‘누구와 결혼하시겠습니까?’

앞선 두 지옥 같은 삶에서 벗어나기 위해 베릴은 진짜 악마인 바인 공작을 선택한다.잔혹한 죽음을 피해 살아남기 위하여,그리고 어쩌면 자신을 죽인 그들에게 잔인한 복수를 이룰 수 있으리라는 생각에.

그렇게 악마 성으로 들어간 베릴.신전에서 욕망을 절제하는 법만 배워왔던 베릴은불경하고 달콤한 악마 바인에게 진정 욕망하는 법을 배우게 되는데…!

title.en: My Furry Harem Is After Me

altTitles.zh-ro: Chong Sheng Zhi Wu Huang Wan Shui

altTitles.en: I am the Crowned King of Hearts
Rebirth: Ten Thousand Sleeping With My Emperor

altTitles.pt-br: Todos os taoístas dizem que meu imperador tem um físico invencível

description.en: Lin Xing, an ordinary 18-year-old guy, is transported into an otherworldly realm in a fantasy novel. There, he awakens an inexhaustible life force within-an “Immortal Infinite Holy Body.” With help from an array of loyal companions-a coquettish phoenix, an innocent ferret, a fierce panda… Lin Xing sets out to uncover the secrets of this mysterious land.

altTitles.en: One Piece - Digital Colored Comics
One Piece

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

altTitles.ja: ダンダダン

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.uk:
Чорти, чудовиська, позаземці, підлітковий роман, махачі та дідько б їх узяв… раковини! У цій манзі ви знайдете все!

Окультний фанбой Такакура, його подруга Аясе та їх надприродні пригоди у новій психоломній манзі!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

altTitles.zh: Quan Qiu Bing Feng: Wo Dazaole Mori Anquan Wu

altTitles.en: Freezing The World: I Built A Doomsday Safehouse

altTitles.zh: Quán Qiú Bīng Fēng: Wǒ Dǎzàole Mòrì Ānquán Wū

altTitles.en: The World Is Frozen: I Built a Doomsday Safe House

altTitles.zh: 全球冰封: 我打造了末日安全屋

altTitles.vi: Toàn Cầu Băng Phong: Ta Chế Tạo Phòng An Toàn Tại Tận Thế
Trái Đất Đóng Băng: Tôi Gầy Dựng Nên Phòng An Toàn Thời Tận Thế
Sông Băng Tận Thế, Ta Trữ Hàng Chục Tỷ Vật Tư

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
description.pt-br: O mundo mergulhou numa era gelada e 95% da humanidade foi exterminada! Em sua vida anterior, nosso herói Zhang Yi foi tragicamente morto pelas mesmas pessoas que ajudou, graças ao seu bom coração. Mas não tema, pois Zhang Yi renasceu e agora possui o incrível poder de manipulação do espaço! Ele ficou completamente maluco acumulando suprimentos para o apocalipse gelado e está pronto para governar o deserto congelado! Ele promete desencadear cem vezes mais dor naqueles que o prejudicaram no passado!

description.ar: بلانش ، البطلة ، خجولة ولطيفة. لكنها محتقرة من قبل عائلتها. لا تستطيع التغلب على ازدراء عائلتها وتحاول الانتحار. عندما فتحت عيني ، كنت في عالم اللعبة الذي صنعته! إذا كنت أرغب في البقاء على قيد الحياة في هذا العالم ، فأنا بحاجة إلى إحضار ريكاردو ، الشرير إلى جانبي. لكن ريكاردو يجري غريب ؟!
description.en:
To Blanche, everything seemed hopeless. Until she realized it was all a game. One she made, to be exact. Now she has a goal: Become the villain's right-hand man! But wait. Why is she the one saving him...?

Blanche, who is timid and kind but is despised by her family, cannot overcome her family's contempt and attempts suicide.

After that, when I opened my eyes, this world was the game world I made!!

To survive in this world, I must have the villain Ricardo to my side. But Ricardo's condition is strange?!

---
To Blanche, everything seemed hopeless. Until she realized it was all a game. One she made, to be exact. Now she has a goal: Become the villain's right-hand man! But wait. Why is she the one saving him...?
description.es: Blanche, la protagonista femenina, es tímida y agradable. Pero ella es despreciada por su familia. No puede superar el desdén de su familia e intenta suicidarse. Cuando abrí los ojos, ¡estaba en el mundo del juego que creé! Si quiero sobrevivir en este mundo, necesito traer a Ricardo, el villano, a mi lado. ¿Pero Ricardo está siendo raro?
description.fr: Née dans une famille qui la martyrise, tout semble perdu d'avance pour Blanche. Mais tout est bien plus simple quand on a créé soi-même le jeu-vidéo dans le quel on vit… Maintenant, elle n'a plus qu'une chose en tête: se joindre au grand méchant de l'histoire pour échapper à son destin. Que la vengeance est douce…
description.id: Blanche, seorang putri kerajaan yang "berbeda" terjebak dalam keluarga yang menggunakannya demi nama baik dan kepentingan mereka. Ingin membalikkan keadaan, apa yang akan Blanche lakukan?
description.ja:
前世の記憶とともによみがえったブランシュ。
家族の元を離れ、悪党リカルドの右腕になろうと無法都市ジギタリスを目指すも、いざ会ったリカルドの様子がおかしい。 
「ブランシュ…頼むから俺を嫌わないでくれ。君に嫌われたらと思うと息もまともにできなくなるんだ。」彼女の耳元でそうささやくとリカルドはぎゅっと抱きしめ涙を流した。
これは世界屈指の悪党たちから崇められる話。そして彼女の寵愛を得ようと一人の男が奮闘する話。
それから…ブランシュが本当の「家族」を選ぶ物語。
description.ko:
소심하고 착하지만 가족에게 멸시를 당하는
블랑쉐(여주)는 가족들의 멸시를 이겨내지 못하고
자살시도를 하고 만다.

그 이후 눈을 뜨니 이 세계는 내가 만들었던 게임세계!!

이 세계에서 살아남을려면
악역인 리카르도(남주)를 내편으로 만들어야해.
그런데 리카르도의 상태가 이상하다?!
description.pt:
Blanche, a irmã mais nova de um dos pretendentes da protagonista feminina, é tímida e simpática. Mas ela é desprezada por seus familiares. Ela não consegue superar o desdém de sua família e tenta cometer suicídio. “Quando abri os olhos, eu estava no mundo do jogo que criei! Se eu quiser sobreviver neste mundo, preciso trazer Ricardo, o vilão, para o meu lado. Mas por que Ricardo está agindo tão estranho assim?!”

---
Blanche, que é tímida e gentil, mas é desprezada por sua família, não consegue superar o desprezo de sua família e tenta o suicídio. Depois disso, quando abri meus olhos, este mundo era o mundo do jogo que eu fiz!! ter o vilão Ricardo ao meu lado. Mas a condição de Ricardo é estranha?!
description.ru: Бланш - милая и робкая девушка. К сожалению, родственники презирают её. У главной героини не получается справиться с пренебрежительным отношением семьи, поэтому бедняжка решается наложить на себя руки... "Открыв глаза, я поняла, что оказалась в собственном игровом мире! Но если мне хочется выжить в нём, то нужно привлечь на свою сторону злодея Рикардо... Постойте, мне кажется, или он ведёт себя как-то странно?!"
description.th: บล็องช์ สาวน้อยสุดอาภัพฟื้นขึ้นมาพร้อมความทรงจำในชาติก่อนเธอจึงหาทางหนีไปจากครอบครัวตัวแสบของตัวเองและมุ่งหน้าไปยังดิจิทาลิส เมืองอันไร้กฎหมายเพื่อเป็นมือขวาของตัวร้ายอย่างริคาร์โด แต่เมื่อพบกันเขากลับทำตัวแปลกประหลาด ริคาร์โดดึงบล็องช์เข้าไปกอดพร้อมน้ำตาไหลแล้วกระซิบข้างหูว่า "อย่าเกลียดข้าเลย ไม่งั้นข้าคงมีชีวิตอยู่ต่อไปไม่ได้แน่" เรื่องราวของสาวน้อยที่ได้รับการยกย่องจากเหล่าตัวร้ายและชายที่ทำทุกอย่างเพื่อให้ได้ความรักของเธอมา
description.uk:
Бланш сором'язлива і добра, але її зневажає сім'я. Не маючи сил поболати презирливе ставлення сім'ї вона чинить спробу самогубства...
Опісля, відкривши очі я зрозуміла, що знаходжусь у світі гри яку створила!! Що б вижити в цьому світі я маю переманити на свій бік злодія Рікардо. Але Рікардо поводиться якось дивно?!

Примітка:Це опис до манхви в ориганалі та перекладах, хоча він не точно передає цю історію. Манхва написана за новелою.
description.vi: Blanche là một nữ chính nhút nhát, thiện lương nhưng cô lại bị chính gia đình của mình khinh thường. Cô không thể chịu đựng thêm việc mình bị lăng nhục và buộc phải tìm đến cái chết. Nhưng khi tỉnh lại, đập vào mắt cô là một bối cảnh quen thuộc- chính là thế giới trong game mà cô đã tạo ra! Cô hiểu rõ rằng nếu muốn tồn tại trong không gian này, Ricardo- kẻ phản diện phải đứng về phía mình. Nhưng mà, đã có gì đó sai sai…
description.zh: 家族耻辱布兰雪，逃婚跳楼觉醒前世记忆，这竟是她所设计的养成恋爱游戏？！只有成为恶女才能舒服地活下去，她利用游戏系统疯狂升级，不仅得到了所有反派的崇拜，连最终BOSS男主都靠她养成？
description.zh-hk:
雖然一直小心善良，但卻被家人蔑視的布蘭雪，某天無法再忍受家人的蔑視，於是試圖自殺。

但睜開眼後，這竟然是我所設計出來的遊戲世界！

如果想要在這個世界上活下去，就必須得讓反派列卡度站在我這邊。

可是列卡度的狀態很奇怪？ ！

---
帶著前世記憶甦醒的布蘭雪，離開了不愛自己的家，一路來到無法治都市狄吉塔利斯。企圖在此成為反派裡卡爾多的左右手以求安身的她，實際遇到裡卡爾多時，卻覺得他有點怪怪的？裡卡爾多哭哭啼啼深怕被她丟下，一副楚楚可憐的模樣……
這是一部描述布蘭雪被世界級黑幫兄弟擁戴崇拜的故事。也是一個男人為了得到她的寵愛而奮鬥的故事。
同時還是…布蘭雪要選擇真正的「家人」的故事。

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

description.de:
Als Sua eines Tages in der Welt ihres Lieblingsromans in der Rolle von Blair aufwacht, ist sie fest entschlossen, dem weiblichen Hauptcharakter Chloe zu helfen, die schwierigste Phase ihres Lebens zu überstehen. Seit Jahren wird Chloe diskriminiert und misshandelt, weil sie ein uneheliches Kind ist. Blair wird zu ihrem Dienstmädchen und zu ihrer Vertrauten und die zwei entwickeln eine besondere Freundschaft. Aber es stellt sich heraus, dass Chloe völlig anders ist, als im eigentlichen Roman dargestellt. Sie benutzt schwarze Magie, beauftragt Blair, ihr mysteriöse Tränke zu besorgen, und scheint keinerlei Interesse an den männlichen Hauptcharakteren zu haben. Dann erscheint eines Tages ein gut aussehender Mann vor Blairs Haustür, der Chloe zum Verwechseln ähnlich sieht. Könnte das ... die Lady sein, der sie gedient hat?! Alles scheint möglich, als die Geschichte von Liebe und Erlösung eine überraschende Wendung nach der anderen nimmt.

---

description.en:
It has been four years since the original heroine ended her life as a maid. A handsome man came to see her. He was a man who looked like the young lady that she used to serve.

"I'm here to keep my promise, Blair. You said that you'd be with me for the rest of your life."

"No way… Young Miss?"

At that moment, the man's crimson eyes turned to meet mine. He bent down till our noses nearly touched and kissed my hair.

And whispered — in a very sweet and beautiful voice —

"You have to call me Young Master now."

…Huh?

---
When Su-A wakes up inside the world of her favorite novel as the character of Blair, she is determined to help the female protagonist, Chloe, get through the darkest period of her life. 

For years, Chloe has had to endure discrimination and abuse for being an illegitimate child. Blair becomes her maid and confidante, and the two form a special friendship. But Chloe turns out to be quite a different character than the one described in the book. She wields black magic, sends Blair to fetch her mysterious potions, and seems totally uninterested in any of the male lead candidates. Then one day, a handsome man who looks an awful lot like Chloe shows up at Blair’s doorstep. Could it be…the lady she used to serve?! 

All bets are off as plot twist after plot twist unravels in this unpredictable tale of love and redemption.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52553678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5440800), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107059249)

description.fr:
Lorsque Sua se réveille soudain dans le monde de son roman préféré, dans le corps du personnage de Blair, elle est bien décidée à aider l’héroïne de l’histoire, Chloé, à surmonter la période la plus sombre de sa vie. Pendant des années, Chloé a dû endurer discrimination et abus, simplement parce qu’elle est une enfant illégitime. Blair devient alors sa servante et confidente, et une amitié toute particulière se forme. Mais voilà que Chloé s’avère être bien différente du personnage décrit dans le roman… Elle pratique la magie noire, envoie Blair chercher de mystérieuses potions, et semble totalement inintéressée par les personnages masculins qui l’entourent. Puis un beau jour, un charmant jeune homme ressemblant extrêmement à Chloé fait son apparition devant la porte de Blair. Se pourrait-il vraiment que ce soit… la demoiselle qu’elle servait? C’est ce qu’il reste à découvrir dans cette histoire d’amour et de rédemption pleine de retournements et d’imprévus!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52553678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5440800), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107059249)

description.ru:
*Это не юри!*

Я не работала горничной уже 4 года. Но однажды у моего дома неожиданно появился красивый мужчина, очень похожий на леди, которой я когда-то служила.

-Я приехал, чтобы исполнить обещание. Ты говорила, что останешься со мной навсегда.

-Не может быть… Госпожа?

В этот момент его красные глаза слегка округлились. Он наклонил голову, поцеловал локон моих волос и нежно прошептал:

-Теперь зови меня "господин."

description.vi:
Khi tỉnh dậy trong thế giới của cuốn tiểu thuyết yêu thích với tư cách là Blair, nữ chính đã quyết tâm giúp Chloe, nữ chính nguyên tác vượt qua thời kỳ đen tối nhất trong cuộc đời cô. Chloe đã phải chịu sự kỳ thị và ngược đãi vì là con ngoài giá thú nhiều năm liền. Blair trở thành người giúp việc và người bạn tâm giao của cô, giữa hai người sau đó hình thành một tình bạn đặc biệt. Nhưng Chloe hóa ra là một nhân vật hoàn toàn khác so với những gì được mô tả trong cuốn sách. Cô ấy sử dụng ma thuật đen, cử Blair đi lấy những lọ thuốc bí ẩn. Ngoài ra, Chloe dường như hoàn toàn không quan tâm đến bất kỳ ứng cử viên nam chính nào. Đến một ngày, một người đàn ông đẹp trai trông rất giống Chloe xuất hiện trước cửa nhà Blair. Người đó… là cô tiểu thư Blair từng phục vụ đó sao?!

---

title.en: Everyone Is from Another World, Except Me!?

altTitles.ja: 僕以外全員転生者かよ

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku igai Zennin Tenseisha ka yo

altTitles.en: Everyone Except Me Is A Reincarnator!?

description.en:
Loco is a novice adventurer who begins his journey to save his sister Natty, who is cursed by a monster into an eternal slumber.

At an adventurer's guild, he meets Taiga, who was given extraordinary abilities when he was reincarnated from another world! He also meets Souya and Mia, who were also reincarnated from another world and have cheat abilities, but something happens that shocks even them!

An entertaining and poignant otherworldly fantasy featuring a party of a novice adventurer, Loco, and three reincarnated characters from another world!
___
**Additional Extra Edition Links:**
- [Official Raw (X)](https://twitter.com/summeryuma/status/1753356644682207438)
- [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0D7VDMWV5)

altTitles.ko: S급 헌터는 악역 공녀가 되기 싫습니다

altTitles.ko-ro: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida

altTitles.en: The S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess

description.en:
"I'm done with romance, so send me home!"

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.

Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home! Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

"Can I go home...?"
description.ko:
**로맨스는 됐으니까 집에나 보내줘!**
김이영, 그녀는 대한민국의 평범한 공무원 시험 응시생이었다.
그것도 4년 반이 넘는 긴 시간동안 공부 끝에 합격한, 낙이라고는 짬짬이 소설읽는 것밖에 없는 정말 평범한 사람.

그러나 합격을 축하하기 위해 외식을 나간 날 교통사고를 당해 죽고, 자신이 읽던 현태판타지 헌터물에 빙의하고 만다.
그런 이영에게 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 길을 제안하는 '시스템'.
그녀는 오로지 집에 돌아가서 배 따땃하게 지지고 귀여운 말티즈 켈베로스를 끌어안겠다는 일념 하에 수십 번씩 회귀하며 힘을 길렀다.
원작 속의 성좌들과 계약하고 수차례 죽어가며 원작 속의 '탑'을 공략하여 결국 마지막 층의 지배자, 탑의 주인을 처리하는 데 성공한다. 

이제 남은 건 집으로 가는 것 뿐……,


인줄 알았는데!

[오류로 인해 원래 세상으로의 복귀 대신, 작가의 신작에 빙의시켜드리겠습니다!]

필요 없어! 내가 바란건 내 스윗 홈뿐이었는데!
그게 그렇게 어려워?! 탑도 내가 없애줬는데?!?!

게다가, 로맨스 판타지라니! 이전 빙의에서도 로맨스의 ㄹ도, 아니, ㄹ의 한 획도 신경 안 쓰고 살았는데!
거기에 이전처럼 내 몸으로 책에 빙의한 게 아니라 책 속의 '악녀'에 빙의했다!

이 세계의 위협은 전혀 두렵지 않지만, 로맨스를 강제로 끌어내는 퀘스트는 걱정된다. 

나, 집에 갈 수 있을까……?
description.pt-br:
**Estou farta de romance, então me mandem para casa!**

Kim Yi-Young era apenas uma candidata comum ao exame de serviço civil na Coreia do Sul. Depois de estudar por mais de quatro anos e meio, finalmente passou, uma pessoa verdadeiramente comum que só gostava de ler romances de vez em quando como passatempo.

No entanto, no dia em que saiu para uma refeição comemorativa após passar no exame, sofreu um acidente de trânsito e morreu, apenas para se ver reencarnada no romance de caçadora de fantasia que estava lendo.

Para ela, o "Sistema" ofereceu um caminho de volta para casa. Determinada apenas a voltar para casa e abraçar seu gato e o adorável Maltês, Cerberus, ela ganhou força através de dezenas de regressões. Assinando contratos com as constelações da obra original e morrendo várias vezes, eventualmente conseguiu conquistar a "Torre" da obra original e derrotar o dono da torre no último andar.

Agora, tudo o que resta é voltar para casa......

Ou pelo menos era o que ela pensava!

[Devido a um erro, em vez de retornar ao mundo original, vamos reencarná-la na nova obra do autor!]

Eu não preciso disso! Tudo o que eu queria era minha doce casa! É tão difícil assim?! Até me livrei da Torre!?!?!

Além disso, fantasia romântica?! Nem mesmo na minha vida anterior eu me importava com romance, nem um pouco! E para piorar, nem reencarnei em meu próprio corpo desta vez, mas na "vilã" do livro!

Não tenho medo das ameaças deste mundo, mas estou preocupada em ser forçada a uma busca romântica.

Será que posso voltar para casa......?

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

altTitles.en: The Real Daughter Has Returned
The Real Daughter Is Back

description.en:
Helga Eutrid, a half-blood noble born from a filthy maid of the Duke’s family, was a substitute daughter–a fake. She worked hard to become a real daughter, and continued to work harder still.

"Duchess! The real lady is alive."
"Her name is… Helianne!”

Helga prayed to God and begged that the real daughter didn’t return to take her place.

"...return, Helianne."
"Please don't return, I beg you."

Helga wondered, was it because she was a fake that her pleas did not reach God?

“Dear God, I have prayed to you countless times, haven’t I? I implore you; do not let her return." She shouted these prayers again and again until her throat turned hoarse; but it was in vain.

'The child who will ruin my whole world…
The Duke family’s real daughter, Helianne.'

The real daughter has returned.

---

Helga Yttri, a half-noble lady who inherited the blood of a lowly maid. 

A bastard child whose position was switched by the Duke's maid; a Fake child.

Helga gave her everything to be recognised as the real daughter. 

"Your Grace! The real Young Miss is alive."
"She goes by the name Hyllian...!" 

Helga prayed to God countless times so that the real Young Miss never returned. 

" ...don't come back, Hyllian."
"Don't come back, please." 

She wondered if her prayers failed to reach God because she was a fake daughter. 

"Dear God, I've been praying countless times." 
"I asked you never to let 'that child' return."

The prayers she howled until her throat went hoarse were all in vain. 

"The real daughter of the House of Yttri, Hyllian... The child who will destroy my whole world." 

The real daughter is back.

"Never forgive me."
Margret, who was brutally murdered by her lover, is reborn 7 years later as 'Meg'. Will 'Meg', who doesn't know anything about the world, be able to acclimate well into her new life...? A story uncovering the truth behind her death and the growing love between the characters!
description.fr:
Terriblement assassinée par son amant, Margaret renaît sous le nom de Mag sept ans plus tard et vit une nouvelle vie.

Mag, qui ne connaissait pas le monde, pourra-t-elle s'adapter à sa nouvelle vie ?
description.ko:
"저를 용서하지 마세요."
 
사랑하는 연인에게 끔찍하게 살해당한 마가렛은
7년 후 '매그'로써 다시 태어나 새로운 삶을 살아간다.
 
세상 물정 모르던 '매그'는 새로운 삶을 잘 적응해 나갈 수 있을까...?
그녀의 죽음에 얽힌 진상과 인물들의 성장 러브 스토리!

description.en: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
description.fr: La vie de Na Hae-soo se désintègre lorsque son mari la trahit en ayant une liaison, la laissant accablée de dettes et perdant leur enfant. Dans un coup dévastateur, elle le surprend avec une femme plus jeune. Brisée et désespérée, Na Hae-soo sent sa vie s'effondrer autour d'elle. Cependant, un jeune homme mystérieux entre soudainement dans sa vie, lui demandant de lui enseigner l'amour adulte. Sa vulnérabilité et sa sincérité commencent à éveiller des émotions en Na Hae-soo, l'incitant à reconsidérer son chemin vers l'avenir.
description.id: Kehidupan Na Haesoo berubah ketika suaminya mengkhianatinya dengan berselingkuh, membuatnya terlilit hutang dan kehilangan anak mereka. Setelah itu, ia mendapati suaminya bersama seorang wanita yang lebih muda. Dengan perasaan hancur dan putus asa, Na Haesoo merasa kehidupannya di sekelilingnya runtuh dan hancur. Namun, seorang pemuda misterius tiba-tiba memasuki hidupnya, Beom Taeha, yang meminta untuk diajari tentang cinta orang dewasa. Keluguan dan ketulusannya mulai mengusik emosi dalam diri Na Haesoo, dan menantangnya untuk mempertimbangkan kembali langkah apa yang akan diambil.
description.pl:
Mój mąż miał romans.
Nie wystarczy wziąć na siebie mnóstwo długów, stracić dziecko, na moich oczach zmieszałam się z bardzo młodą kobietą. Zranione życie usychało bez żadnego wyglądu.
"Pokarz mi miłość dorosłego" - podejrzany młodszy mężczyzna, który wtargnął w życie Na Haesoo.
Niebezpieczny i posłuszny, zaczyna potrząsać Na Haesoo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kino no Tabi - the Beautiful World

altTitles.ja: キノの旅 the Beautiful World

altTitles.en: Kino's Journey - the Beautiful World

description.en: Destination is a state of mind. A tale of one girl and her bike and the road ahead. Kino wanders around the world on the back of Hermes, her unusual, anthropomorphic motorcycle, only staying in each country for three days. During their adventures, they find happiness, sadness, pain, decadence, violence, beauty, and wisdom. But through it all, they never lose their sense of freedom. They discover that because of the world's imperfections, it is actually a thing of beauty. "The world is not beautiful, therefore it is."

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
